title: Interpretation of seeing a lost mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: Losing a mobile phone in a dream, this dream is one of the dreams that we see frequently, as the dreamer tends to search for its interpretation, as it is considered a common dream and it is known that smart devices have become an integral part of reality, especially since the use of these devices has become very large, If one sees it in a dream, it makes the person who sees it curious to know what his dream shows, so in this article the interpretation of losing a mobile phone in a dream will become clear. Value in the dreamer's life, and the following are the most important interpretations they gave: If the dreamer sees in his dream that his mobile phone is lost, this indicates his difficult financial situation, and he will also lose his job and decline in his position. Also, if someone sees in his dream that he lost his mobile phone, this indicates It symbolizes the emergence of family quarrels and tense relationships with close people. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is searching for his cell phone. This indicates that he is suffering from decline, distraction, and a loss of the ability to determine his life’s goal. Also, this vision for a person working in the field of trade indicates that he He suffers from failure, decline, and great financial loss. Some interpreters believe that this dream represents wasting time on real things and worthless matters. Others also say that this vision is an indication of the state of anxiety and despair that the person is in in reality. While psychologists believe that This dream expresses that the dreamer has actually lost a certain thing, and is still thinking about it. This dream also indicates the dreamer’s need to hide the secrets of his home and his family’s private matters to remain safe and secure. Losing a cell phone in a dream See also: Interpretation of dreams about a broken phone in a dream for single, married, and pregnant womenDream Losing a cell phone by a married woman. A married woman is looking for a reassuring and comforting interpretation of this dream in her dream, as there are many interpretations and explanations, as follows: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is losing her cell phone, this indicates that something bad will happen to her or her family. Also, if a married woman sees that her phone is broken in her dream, this indicates the emergence of some disagreement and problems between her and her husband. In addition, the same dream symbolizes instability and comfort in their marital relationship. Likewise, if a woman sees this vision in a dream, it means that she She fell and this is a message to take care of her. If a married woman sees that she has lost her phone, she searches for it inside and outside the house. There is no doubt that this is an indication that she is in trouble, as it is expected to be caused by the people of this house. Whereas if a married woman sees in her dream That a member of her family lost his phone. This indicates that this person has been exposed to a serious and major problem, from which he will be harmed. While psychologists believe that the interpretation of this vision for a married woman is a reflection of her anxiety and fear about her future. Loss

title: A white dog in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Therefore, seeing dogs in general in a dream has many meanings, as the colors of dogs differ from black, white, etc. Opinion of some interpreters. Interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream for a single girl. If the white dog ate and stayed with her in her house, the vision indicates the presence of an evil person entering her life. If he sees an unmarried woman in his dream, he is sitting next to a white dog. The dream indicates a cunning person He wants to bond with her. But if she sees the white dog from afar and it is very cold, then the vision means intercourse with a paralyzed person. An unmarried girl sees a white dog in her dream and she sees it from afar showing her fear of someone. The same vision also shows the presence of a wild person trying to get close From her to harm her. The white wild dog approached the unmarried girl and was near her in the dream. It is an indication of evil or calamity that will fall into her, but he will come out of it, God willing. The girl’s vision of the white dog indicates that she is wonderful in her life and excels in a profession or job. Seeing a dog A white wild dog tearing her clothes indicates that there are bad people in her life who do not wish her well. They may be the reason for her getting into trouble, so she should stay away from them. An unmarried girl who sees a white dog attacking her and running away from her means that the vision will be abundant and will come to her soon. If you see in a dream a white dog eating its meat, then the vision means great harm affecting her honor or her wealth, and God knows best. When a girl sees in her dream that she is eating the food of a white dog, this is evidence of the presence of evil near her, whether it is madness or forgetfulness, and God knows best. When a girl sees this The dream, she must fortify herself close to God, remember God and read the Qur’an. See also: Seeing dogs running after me in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees a white dog in her dream, this means that her husband will soon give her a big gift. As for About seeing a wild white dog in a dream, approaching her dirty. The vision is evidence of haters full of cunning and deception trying to mislead her. As for a married woman, when she dreams of buying a white dog. The vision shows that this woman will get rid of all the problems she is going through in her life. But seeing her husband He buys her a white wild dog and gives it to her, meaning that he will betray her in the near future. A married woman dreams that a white dog is chasing her and she was able to escape from it. The vision means his ability to deal with the problems he faces. Her escape from the white dog that attacked her saved her from obstacles in her life and brings good news. That God will be with her, God willing. A married woman who sees a small white dog in her dream indicates that this woman cares about others. If a married woman sees a huge white dog and she has a debt, then the vision indicates that this debt will be repaid as quickly as possible. The vision A large dog is also evidence that she is looking for security and peace in her home. A white pet dog in a married woman’s dream that good news will arrive for her soon. The meaning of seeing a white dog in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation

title: The 12 most important interpretations of seeing cats in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing cats alone in a dream? Conclusive evidence of the presence of someone in her life. What does it mean to see a black cat? It indicates betrayal and disloyalty to the wife. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant cat in a dream? Clear evidence that she will give birth to a boy. The meaning of a single girl seeing cats? News items Pleasant and happy. What is the interpretation of seeing a man eating cat meat in a dream? It shows that he will learn magic and practice it. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream, according to the family situation of the person who dreams and the type and color of the animal. There are many interpretations of dreams. Cats are pets, but the interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream varies according to its appearance, whether it is alive or Dead, as well as its color, which ranges from black to white. Cats are free dreams. Keep in mind that if a single girl dreams of seeing cats in a dream, this is convincing evidence of the presence of a person in her life. Characterized by deception, not serious in love, treachery, treachery, and cunning, because This symbolizes betrayal in general and alienation, and she must be careful and careful. Whereas if a single girl dreams of seeing kittens in a dream, she will be surprised by the good and happy news that will make her happy in her life, including success and marriage. And also to gain comfort and happiness in her life. And great joy in the future. Interpretation of a dream about cats for a married woman: If a married girl sees or dreams of seeing cats in a dream, this is convincing evidence, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, of her failure in love and her failure in her marriage. Especially if the cat is black, this indicates the husband’s betrayal and disbelief, and the presence of a malicious person with malicious intent. Bad towards the wife, but if a married woman sees the tail of a black cat in her dream, this means that she is lucky in love. Seeing a dream about a pregnant catSince pregnancy, dreams have many different interpretations from other social situations. If she dreams that she is pregnant, this is considered good news and clear evidence that she will give birth. A boy. Interpretation of a dream about cats for men. As for the interpretation of a dream about cats, it differs from man to woman. If a man dreams that a cat enters his house, he must be careful and careful, because a thief will enter his house, or he could be a member of his family, and there is someone supporting him in the house who must take care of him. As for For a man who dreams of himself selling cats in a dream, this may be a sign that he will lose his money or lose his job. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, whoever dreams of black cats is a sign of envy and malice among some women. If a man sees that he is eating cat meat in a dream, this means He will learn magic and practice it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Snakes are among the things that one does not like to deal with in reality, and despite the desire of a few to raise them, they cause terror and fear at all times and can appear in a dream in different forms, each of which has an appropriate interpretation that indicates this. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake? Seeing a black snake in a dream usually means the presence of a hater who hates people and does not show it to others, and you must be careful in dealing with them in all matters. Its presence on the bed or the place where a person sleeps is evidence of the wife’s betrayal or her attempt to cause It causes a lot of trouble for the husband and harms him. Its presence in the place of eating, such as the kitchen, is evidence of the state of poverty that a person may suffer from, and the lack of ingenuity in securing a living, with which he satisfies his hunger and the hunger of everyone else. Members of his family. His appearance in front of the house means the presence of many envious people who look at the dreamer with malice in exchange for all the blessings that he enjoys in his life that they do not possess and they want to eliminate them from his hands. It is the eye that afflicts a person and those with him in his family home, so he must approach the Lord of the Worlds. He follows the Holy Qur’an to protect himself from this envy. His presence in the place where a person works is evidence of the false rumors that some people tell about him and the rumors that they tell about him in his absence. Sometimes it symbolizes the differences that may exist between everyone in the house, including the wife and children, He needs to think carefully to avoid bad consequences. Possession of a person in a dream is one of the things that indicates that he is gaining influence, power, and large sums of money that he uses to achieve all the dreams he lived for in his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake by Ibn Sirin? Explanation of the great interpreter Ibn Sirin There are many types of dreams in which this black snake can appear, and each of them is explained in a simplified way, and we can say as follows: Its meaning is the presence of an enemy lurking for a person and trying to cause him misfortune, and they do not wish good for him or his family members. Its appearance in the water from Things that show a person’s ability to conquer enemies, rid him of everyone who hates him in the society in which he lives, and restore the peaceful life that he enjoyed in previous periods of his life. It symbolizes the correct decisions that a person makes in the face of the problems that he suffers from and that he works to solve. And turning his life into a better situation than before. His presence inside the dreamer’s house is a kind of warning that there is a person carrying hatred and malice near his house and that he shows him love so that he will not be punished. If a person is bitten in a dream, this means that there are many changing problems. Life is in a state of despair and frustration and a person’s inability to keep up with all the developments in his life. Killing her is a sign of his distancing himself from all enemies and escaping their cunning and getting rid of them forever, and it cannot get him into trouble. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a snake the black

title: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing magic in a dream has many connotations. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting seeing magic in a dream depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing the effect of magic in a dream indicates that unpleasant things will happen to the fortuneteller in the coming period. Seeing resistance to magic in a dream indicates that the monarch is... He has wisdom and a sound mind. Seeing the dreamer bewitching people in a dream indicates that the dreamer has committed evil and forbidden things. Seeing people practicing magic in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s circumstances for the better. Seeing a magician in a dream indicates the dreamer’s trip outside his homeland and he will spend an enjoyable time on this trip. See also Interpretation of seeing magic amulets in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq? Seeing magic in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to distinguish between a married or close person. Seeing the jaw of magic in a dream indicates many evil people around the dreamer who envy him and wish him harm, but The dreamer will reveal them soon. Seeing magic in a dream also indicates Satan’s control over the dreamer’s thoughts and his dominion over him. See also: Interpretation of seeing envy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a single woman? Seeing witches only in a dream shows her inability to think about the future and her next steps. Seeing a woman An unmarried woman is a witch in a dream. It indicates that there is an evil person in her life who always lies and deceives her. What is the interpretation of seeing witchcraft in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman is magical in a dream. It says that she does not have the ability to take responsibility for her family and perform the duties assigned to her. Seeing a married witch is In a dream, she stated that someone close to her was planning to cause her to fall. See also: Interpretation of seeing something coming out of the mouth in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant witch in a dream indicates that she always feels anxious and tense when she thinks about the birth process and what will happen to her. Seeing a witch Pregnant in a dream. It indicates that there is a bad and lying person in her life. The interpretation that sees a place of magic. Seeing a location of magic in a dream. It indicates that there are many machinations and evil things that have been prepared for the pioneer during this period. The dreamer sees that his house is a place of magic in a dream. It indicates the dimension of the people of This verse is about God and not adhering to the matters assigned to them religiously. The dreamer sees that he is inside a special place for magic in a dream, which indicates that the fortuneteller will suffer from serious health problems in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing a place for magic in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has committed many sins in his life. And disobedience. See also: Interpretation of seeing buried magic in a dream. We are pleased to see the reception of your dream about “seeing magic” through the comments and Free will

title: Interpretation of a dream about a tooth falling out

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream varies according to the condition of the person who sees it, and the vision has many interpretations that we will learn in the following lines from the gptafser.com/ website. Interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl in her sleep, her lower jaw falling out. An undesirable sign for the girl, As the vision indicates the girl’s sadness in the coming period as a result of the loss of someone close to her. It also indicates that you will see a single girl losing her tooth after it decays. To the point of serious sorrows, worries and fears that the girl will experience in the coming period of her life, and God knows best. But if she sees In her dream, she is brushing her teeth. The vision indicates that the viewer’s condition has improved psychologically and physically. It also indicates that she has gotten rid of her sorrows and achieved everything she desires in life. Seeing one girl in her sleep pulling her upper molar and feeling pain and fatigue. The dream indicates that the girl with the vision You will lose a lot of money. If he sees her, he will painlessly remove the fang located at the top of the mouth. The vision is a sign of the abundance of goodness and great happiness that fills the life of the dreamer. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means the fall of her age and her engagement. In reference to the fact that her relationship with her fiancé It will end soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her tooth is falling out. The vision is the result of the sadness and anxiety that she will soon see in her life with the failure of her romantic relationship. If she sees in a dream that a tooth fell out in her hand. Great evidence that you will win. A lot of money soon. Such as a tooth falling out in a girl’s dream and falling to the ground. The vision indicates that the girl will die soon. title: Interpretation of seeing roasted liver in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating liver in a dream for a married woman. Food point. Fatty liver in a dream. The married woman will face problems and family disputes, and these differences will soon disappear. Also, eating raw liver in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the problems that she will overcome and in a short time they will pass and end. As for seeing the wife As she offers liver to her husband in a dream, this is evidence of the exchange of love, honesty, and intimacy between them, and that he will not leave her no matter what happens. Concerning food for a married woman, liver has a wonderful taste, and this is evidence of the justice of its offspring. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled liver for a married woman. Grilled liver food in a married woman’s dream is evidence that another woman She occupies her husband’s mind and possesses him to marry her. A married woman who eats liver in a dream indicates that she will give birth to good offspring in the near future. And if a married woman sees herself in a dream eating grilled liver, this is evidence that she lives in abundance and prosperity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of cutting Liver with intent for an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried girl cutting raw liver and feeding it to a stranger is a sign of hostility and hatred. Seeing raw liver and cutting it into small pieces in a dream means quarrels and problems that will soon pass and things will calm down. Eating raw liver in a dream also indicates unexpected gains. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating a lot of liver dishes, this is a sign of striving to achieve Desires and dreams. Seeing cooked liver in a dream, and that someone is eating it, is a sign that you are finding goodness and benefiting from that person. The liver in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence that someone is approaching her for marriage, to make her happy. The liver in the dream of the unmarried woman also symbolizes To success, as he occupies the highest positions in study, and it also indicates the achievement of goals and successes for the girl in the work environment. But if a girl sees in a dream, cooked liver, this is a sign of winning a prestigious and prestigious job. If a girl sees fried liver in a dream, this is evidence of the fulfillment of desires And the aspirations that the girl seeks in her life. As for cutting a liver in a dream, it may symbolize the power and influence that this girl has. Also, if a girl dreams that she is cutting a liver with the intention of cutting it and the cutting is very difficult, this indicates that she will stumble in several matters in her life. Interpretation of seeing a liver in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a liver in a pregnant woman’s dreams indicates that her due date is approaching and that she will enjoy health and prosperity for herself and her child. Its meaning is different from eating grilled liver in a dream. Also, seeing a liver in a pregnant woman’s dream can symbolize abundant food, blessings and kindness in the face of the child. New.But if she sees herself eating liver in the dream, this may indicate that she is feeling pain during the birth process and has just returned to good health with t

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for one girl: When ants appear in one girl’s bed. It appears that there is a lot of talk about marriage with her family. If she works, the presence of ants in her hair indicates that there are problems there. If they see ants in her clothes, this indicates how much she is valued. For herself and how elegant she is. In addition to seeing many black ants in a female’s dream. It shows that he has many untrustworthy friends. Also, seeing ants indicates that he is wasting money on unnecessary things, and God knows best. She is a generous giver and thinks a lot about money, According to her unique dream related to ants. See also: Seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for a married woman. There are many opinions on how to interpret a married woman’s vision of ants in a dream, such as: If a married woman sees ants in her dream, this means an increase in the value of income Commercial for her husband. If a married woman sees ants in her dream and they are white-skinned, this portends her husband’s promotion to a higher position. However, it is a sign of great strength and goodness if a married woman notices ants while she is sleeping in bed. However, the presence of ants in A married woman’s dream indicates intelligence and good judgment. A married woman’s love for her husband is strongly expressed when she sees ants in her dreams. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream about a man and its meaning: A man may see ants in his house or on his bed in a dream. There are several possible meanings in this case, including those listed below:If a man sees ants wandering around his house in a dream, it means that he will advance in his career. However, if a man sees ants in his house in a dream, this is evidence of his kindness to Others. Seeing ants in a man’s dream means that he will get a lot of money and food. In addition, it is a sign that God will provide the man with a good wife if he sees ants stinging him in a dream. However, seeing red ants in a dream indicates a strong man’s love And his loyalty to his wife. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about ants in clothes. The meaning of seeing ants in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. There is no doubt that the pregnant woman who dreams of ants is searching for the meaning of this dream, and there are many possible interpretations, such as: When a pregnant woman sees termites in a dream, this heralds goodness for the fetus. And God knows best. Therefore, if a pregnant woman sees red ants in a dream, the child will most likely be a girl. The pregnant woman will also receive good news after giving birth if she finds ants in food in a dream. Another sign that the child will be a boy is if the pregnant woman sees ants Lions in her dreams. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream for young people and its meaning. If a young man sees in his dream that his body is covered with many ants of different sizes and shapes, this portends great goodness. If he sees ants inside his house in a dream, God willing, he will soon reach a distinguished position. If a young man sees ants He is bitten all over his body in a dream, this portends a lucky fortune

title: Interpretation of a dream about adultery with a sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of adultery with a sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin It is known that dreams are a series of fantasies that occur to a person during sleep, and some know that it is a mental activity or a specific motive, but everyone agrees that dreams come during sleep and the first to be interested in interpretation. Of the dreams was the Sumerian civilization, which is the oldest civilization known to history, and many scholars were interested in interpreting dreams such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Khaldun and others, so we will learn through this article about the interpretation of a dream of adultery with a sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of adultery with a sister in a dream The dream of having sex with a sister in a dream is one of the unpredictable dreams, and it is an unpleasant vision for many people, and this dream indicates his participation in disobedience and sins, and it also shows that the relationships are illegitimate. , The sister's adultery indicates the loss of contact with the sister she needs, and seeing him having sex with his pregnant sister indicates a strong relationship between the brother and his sister and that the child will have many qualities from the brother. What is the interpretation of a dream about adultery with a sister in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said that a dream about adultery with incest shows many sins that he commits in his life and cannot be freed from its grip, whether in his private life or in his relationship with God Almighty: Ibn Sirin mentioned the dream of adultery for a man who is approached by a woman in a dream, symbolizes profit in work, but these profits are illegitimate. And if he knows this woman’s husband, it shows the Nile and the theft of his money in the current reality, but he commits sins and seeks to enter forbidden money without telling anyone. What is the interpretation of seeing incest in a dream? Sheikh Ibn Shaheen believes that the dream of incest is one of the great things that indicate the sadness of God Almighty, and if a person sees that he has intercourse with one of his relatives, whether she is his sister or someone else from incest, this indicates severing ties with the womb, and it is one of the great sins that God will punish and break the womb on the Day of Resurrection, and if he does that to a dead person, it is one of the sins. Evidence of the crises that haunt him, or the obsessions he faces in his daily life, and he must return to God and repent, and reach His mercy, and continue the bond of kinship. Interpretation of a dream of adultery with an aunt in a dream Seeing a person having sex with his wife in a dream is a strange vision, because he has intercourse with one of his relatives and the dreamer may be afraid of this matter, and we will provide you with an interpretation of the dream of communicating with an aunt in a dream: In the event that he sees his aunt's wife, this is evidence of the continuation of the kinship that he considers like his mother. And when he sees that he has a close relationship and is very happy with it, this is evidence that he will get something good in the coming days. And if he sees that he is accompanying his aunt, and she refuses, this is evidence that the person has offended many bad things. And if he sees that he is having intercourse with his aunt while she is crying, this is one of the signs of sin, and he does not want to reveal it. There are many praiseworthy dreams that herald good, and there are also many unpleasant dreams, and this is due to the person who sees them, the situation he is in, and the interpretation

And if he sees that he is having intercourse with his aunt while she is crying, then this is a sign of sin, and he does not want to reveal it. There are many praiseworthy dreams Which bodes well, and there are also many unpleasant dreams, and this is due to the person who sees them, the situation he is in, and the interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about berries for a divorced woman

preview.html: Through our topic today, we will learn with you the interpretation of a dream about berries in detail, and we will also discuss the vision of eating berries and berries and their different colors, so stay tuned. Interpretation of a dream about berries for a divorced womanInterpretation scholars say that fruitful berries in a dream symbolize the father, the head of the family, the director of the company, or the person in charge of Those around him, out of love and giving. Berries in a divorced woman’s dream indicate that she lives in the embrace of her father, who takes care of her, supports her, and facilitates her previous experience. If a divorced woman plants mulberry trees in a dream, then she is on the verge of a new marriage, forming a family, and perhaps starting a new project, by God. I know. While the berries are dry without fruit in the dream. It expresses the dreamer’s lack of support and livelihood and the feeling of loneliness and loss after divorce. Blackberry thorns in a dream indicate betrayal of relatives and friends. Also, blueberries in a dream indicate intermarriage between relatives and an increase in family offspring. Leaves Berries in a dream for a divorced woman indicate children. Likewise, eating raspberry leaves in a dream means that the mother will exploit her children for money. Watering raspberries in a dream is a sign that you care for the father and his kindness. Uprooting raspberries is interpreted as disobedience to parents and ruin. Raspberries symbolize Ripe in a dream is divided into her good reputation, her fragrant walk among people and her love for goodness. Eating red berries in a dream means that a divorced woman will marry a handsome man with a strong and attractive personality with whom she will live happily and stably. Seeing eating blueberries in a dream indicates a divorced woman. Traveling abroad To work and learn new skills and arts that will benefit her. As for blackberries, it is not good to see them, and planting them in a dream indicates sadness and grief. And eating blackberries is diseases that affect the body. Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream for one girl. In most books related to the interpretation of dreams, it is mentioned that seeing berries in a dream for a woman Unmarried indicates her marriage to a person she loves and desires. Red berries in a girl’s dream symbolize happy occasions, positive news, and a good psychological state, and God knows best. The vision of eating green and white berries indicates recovery and recovery from illness. And squeezing green berries is good news about overcoming adversity and difficulties. Mulberry leaves in one's dream indicate family bonding and family harmony. Mulberry leaves show family care and dependence. Black mulberries also symbolize problems and concerns. White mulberries represent religion and science. Either green berries indicate comfort and ease. Mulberry juice in a dream indicates praise and flattery. The benefits of drinking raspberry juice and the material benefits that the dreamer will gain soon. What is the interpretation of seeing raspberries in a dream for a married woman? Imam Al-Sadiq says that raspberries in a married woman’s dream indicate her offspring and the extension of her progeny to children and grandchildren, and God knows best. If a married woman eats raspberries and enjoys their taste in a dream According to Islamic law, she eats money from her children’s work, and God knows best. The mulberry tree in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her father and husband. Whether mulberry jam in a dream indicates
